subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सी मंगल है?
explanation_en: Jaisalmer Fort is located in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan. It is one of the famous forts in Rajasthan known for its architecture and historical significance.
